properties.displayName: [Deprecated]: API App should only be accessible over HTTPS
properties.description: Use of HTTPS ensures server/service authentication and protects data in transit from network layer eavesdropping attacks. We recommend all customers who are still using API Apps to implement the built-in policy called 'App Service apps should only be accessible over HTTPS', which is scoped to include API apps in addition to Web Apps.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
